Name: Auto-coagulant Injector
Effect: Requires an Easy (+40) Medicae Test to administer. If successful, removes the Bleeding Condition from the recipient. The Bleeding Condition returns within 3 hours if proper medicae treatment is not received.

Name: Body Bag
Effect: Environmentally sealed to isolate the dead (and any disease or toxins) from the living. Allows safe transport of corpses to medical or processing facilities. Advanced versions with preservatives can keep a corpse intact for up to a decade.

Name: Combat Diagnostor
Effect: Functions as a Diagnostor but worn on the forearm. Provides +2 Armour to the arm it is worn on, which can be incorporated into existing armour. Grants battlefield diagnostics, vital sign monitoring, and micro-surgery tools. Breaks if that arm’s Armour is reduced to 0.

Name: Officio Medicae Medipack
Effect: Contains standard medicae tools and drugs, including one Injector, and doses of De-tox and Hyper-coagulant. Grants the bearer +1 SL on any Medicae Test.

Name: Militarum Issue Medipack
Effect: Contains enhanced medicae tools including an Injector, Microfauna Inhibitor Spray, and doses of Adrenaline Shot, De-tox, Hyper-coagulant, and Stimm. Grants the bearer +2 SL on any Medicae Test.

Name: Hospitaller Medipack
Effect: Includes multiple Injectors, sacred medicae supplies, and doses of Adrenaline Shot, De-tox, Hyper-coagulant, and Stimm. Grants the bearer +2 SL on any Medicae Test. In addition, any patient treated gains +1 SL on Fortitude Tests for 1 hour.

Name: Adrenaline Shot
Effect: When administered, immediately removes the Stunned Condition and allows the bearer to ignore the Fatigued Condition for 1 hour.

Name: De-tox
Effect: Removes the Poisoned Condition and counters effects of other drugs. May cause side effects (vomiting, nosebleeds, cramps). Requires a Challenging (+0) Toughness Test or the bearer becomes Stunned for 1d10 minutes.

Name: Hyper-coagulant
Effect: Immediately removes the Bleeding Condition. The Bleeding Condition returns within 3 hours if further medicae attention is not received.

Name: Meta-regulant
Effect: When administered, the bearer gains +2 SL on Medicae Tests made on them for the next hour, but suffers –2 SL on any Fortitude Tests during that time.

Name: Stimm
Effect: When administered, the bearer ignores the effects of Critical Wounds and Injuries for 1d10 rounds + their Toughness Bonus. Commonly used to push soldiers through firefights at the cost of collapse later.

Name: Suspension Vat (Biochemical)
Effect: Counts as Excellent Quality Medical Care. Capable of preserving a body in biochemical amniotic stasis. Can bring someone back from near death within days and extend lifespan seemingly by decades. Requires constant monitoring.

Name: Suspension Vat (Cryogenic)
Effect: Counts as Excellent Quality Medical Care. Preserves a body in cryogenic suspension for months or years. Can treat wounds and injuries, though recovery is slower than biochemical vats. Requires daily monitoring and immense energy.
